   Position context: Blocked creativity or false starts shaped your path. A time when inspiration came but didn't ignite. That failed spark echoes.

4. Future: Seven of Swords (upright)

5. Above: The Hanged Man (upright)
   Keywords: surrender, new perspective, pause, letting go

   Position context: Your highest possibility is wisdom through surrender. The best outcome involves complete letting go for new perspective. Aim for the Hanged Man's illumination.

6. Below: Nine of Wands (upright)
   Keywords: fruition, attainment, wisdom
   Base meaning: Meaning not available

7. Advice: Death (upright)

   Position context: Surrender to the transformation. Stop bargaining with the inevitable. The guidance is to release gracefully rather than be dragged through.

8. External: The Emperor (upright)
   Keywords: authority, structure, control, father figure

   Position context: Outside influences involve authority or structure. A father figure, boss, or institution affects things. Or circumstances demand you take charge.

9. Hopes/Fears: Queen of Cups (reversed)
   Keywords: nurturing, intuitive, mastery
   Base meaning: Meaning not available

10. Outcome: Five of Wands (reversed)

- Death + The World: Transformation completing a cycle. Something ends so wholeness can emerge. Death as final integration.
- The World + Ace of Wands: Completion sparking new beginning. One cycle ending as creative initiative begins. Achievement creating platform for next venture.
